identity.name: Energy-Morph
identity.archetype: Electric & Neon (Future, Speed, Disruption) mixed with Swiss & High-Contrast (Authority)
design_principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Tesla precision with organic morphing energy flows.
Emotion First: Every data point must feel 'alive'.
Content is King: Data is the hero; UI is the HUD.
Zoom In: Focus on critical metrics (sparklines, KPIs).
Negative Space: Use dense grids but leave breathing room within cards.
Contrast: High contrast for readability in 'Control Room' environments.

headings.usage: Main page titles, KPI values, Section headers

mono.usage: Code snippets, Hash IDs, Raw Data values

primary.name: Electric Blue
primary.usage: Energy Flows, Active States, Primary Actions

secondary.name: Forest Green
secondary.usage: Efficiency Gains, Renewable Inputs, Success States

accent.name: Tesla Red
accent.usage: Alerts, High Demand Zones, Critical Errors

layout.grid_system: Mode B: The Control Room Grid
rules: Use h-full on children to ensure they stretch.
Dashboard widgets must align to the grid.

cards.style: Flat background (Surface color), 1px subtle border (Neutral/20), No shadow by default.
cards.hover: Slight lift (-translate-y-1), Neon Shadow, Border color becomes Primary.

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 rounded-sm font-medium tracking-wide uppercase text-xs
buttons.secondary: border border-input bg-background hover:bg-accent hover:text-accent-foreground rounded-sm font-medium tracking-wide uppercase text-xs

inputs.style: bg-background border-input ring-offset-background placeholder:text-muted-foreground focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-ring focus-visible:ring-offset-2 disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50 rounded-sm

charts.style: Transparent background, Neon lines, Minimal grid lines, Tooltips with glassmorphism.

motion.morphing: Use framer-motion layoutId for smooth transitions between grid states.

solar_farm.description: Green field with solar panels, suitable for 'Renewable Inputs' section background or card image.

wind_turbine.description: Clean white wind turbine against blue sky, for 'Wind Energy' metrics.

server_room.description: High tech server room with blue lights, for 'AI/SNN Predictions' or 'Data Center' context.

instructions_to_main_agent: Implement the 'Control Room' grid layout strictly.
Use the specified color palette for all charts and UI elements.
Ensure the Dark/Light mode toggle works and defaults to Dark Mode.
Use Plotly.js for all charts as requested.
Integrate the provided images where contextually appropriate (e.g., as backgrounds for specific KPI cards or in the 'Grid Analytics' page).
Apply 'Manrope' font for headings and 'IBM Plex Sans' for body text.
Use 'JetBrains Mono' for all numerical data and code-like elements.
Create a 'Morphing Heatmap' component using a gradient mesh or Plotly heatmap with smooth transitions.
Ensure all interactive elements have data-testid attributes.
universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for dark colors.
Create depth through z-index and glassmorphism.
